events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn’t fit and I want to return it for a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case based on their need to return the jacket.
The support agent responsible for refund requests has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello! I’m happy to assist you with your refund. Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return?
To proceed with your refund, please share the order number along with any issues you faced with the jacket.
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is too tight around the shoulders and I would like to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days for a full refund. I will send you the return shipping label by email shortly.
That sounds perfect, thank you! I’ll wait for the shipping label email and send it back right away.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email address. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have sent back the jacket and if there’s anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday via the shipping label you provided. Thanks for your help throughout the process!
We have received the jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear on your original payment method shortly.
Your refund case is now closed. Please reach out if you need any further assistance in the future.
